Key Match Events: Jackson Irvine scored the first goal in the 50th minute
Jordan Bos scored the second goal in the 73rd minute
Post-Match Reflections: Indian coach Igor Stimac kept an eagle-eyed watch on his wards
Lallianzuala Chhangte offered a quick prayer before the match
Miscellaneous Highlights: India, who displayed remarkable grit and determination in the first half to keep their rivals at bay

The large number of Indian fans present at the ground must have felt proud and encouraged by the fact that the Blue Tigers, though beaten, were not overwhelmed by their mighty rivals and chose to fight
Others: India will play their next match in Group B against Uzbekistan on January 18 at the Ahmad bin Ali Stadium at 20:00 IST

India XI: Gurpreet Singh Sandhu, Nikhil Poojary, Rahul Bheke, Sandesh Jhingan, Subhasish Bose (Liston Colaco, 74), Lalengmawia Apuia, Deepak Tangri (Anirudh Thapa, 78), Suresh Singh Wangjam (Akash Mishra, 74), Manvir Singh, Sunil Chhetri (Naorem Mahesh Singh, 89), Lallianzuala Chhangte (Vikram Pratap Singh, 89)
